data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: If you were not afraid of failing, what is something that you would try? Explain the reasons for your choice.
data.answer: Well, if I were not afraid of failing, I would try another career. I mean I could try something new such as skiing but there is nothing to be afraid of if I am not good at it. But when it comes to a different career, it is definitely something I would be careful with. A new career means a totally different area of knowledge and skills which requires an extensive amount of time to acquire. Nevertheless, with the correct amount of training, having a new career would bring much more into my life.
